q: Iraq troop draw down speed.| Reuters Former Defense Secretary Donald Rumsfeld is conceding`` it's possible'' that the biggest mistake of the Iraq war came in drawing down troops too quickly. I don't have enough confidence to say that that's right. I think that it's possible, he said.`` We had[ an] enormous number of troops ready to go in. As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said,`` I care deeply about animals'' and`` am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to`` propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future.
